nodes.text: The GAT-12g "Skipray" was part of the GAT Blastboat series produced by Sienar Fleet Systems.
The GAT-12g "Skipray" was a sub-model of the twenty-five meter long GAT-12 Skipray Blastboat. The GAT-12g replaced the usual missile launcher with a tractor beam.
The GAT-12g was used by Imperial forces.
